metadata.title: Example Post
metadata.description: This frontmatter description will appear below the title

posts.content: This is a Markdown syntax example post. ## HTML This is italic using raw HTML. ### React component --- ## Headers # H1 ## H2 ### H3 #### H4 --- ## Emphasis _Italic_ or _Italic_ **Bold** or **Bold** **_Bold and Italic_** ~one~ or ~~two~~ tildes ~~Strikethrough~~ --- ## Lists ### Unordered List - Item 1 - Item 2 - Subitem 2.1 - Subitem 2.2 ### Ordered List 1. First 2. Second 1. Sub-second 2. Sub-third --- ## Links [link](https://qingshanasd.cn) [home](/posts) --- ## Images ![Alt text](https://qingshanasd.cn/favicon.ico) --- ## Code Inline `code` example. Code Block ```python def hello(): print("Hello, world!") ``` --- ## Blockquotes > This is a blockquote. > > > Nested blockquote. --- ## Tables | Header 1 | Header 2 | | -------- | -------- | | Cell 1 | Cell 2 | | Cell 3 | Cell 4 | --- ## Task Lists - [x] Task 1 - [ ] Task 2 --- ## Escaping Characters \*Literal asterisk\* \# Literal hash \[Literal brackets\] --- ## Footnote Here is a footnote reference[^1]. [^1]: This is the footnote text.
